Reviews.Title: Lumix GH1
Reviews.Author: Thomas Moody "Tom Moody"
Reviews.Content: A very surprising camera! It's compares favorably to my Canon 5D Mark II and 7D. The small size, even with the G Vario 7mm lens makes it an easy choice to grab for "what if" situations. The MENU give such great choices in both stills and videos. Some of the video shot with this camera have been included in sequences shot with the above cameras plus Sony's CineAlta cams. Many delightful surprises with the LUMIX have made this one of my favorites. For the price HIGHLY recommended.

ProductInfo.Features:
Standard Accessories - Battery Charger/AC Adapter, Battery Pack, Body Cap, AV Cable, USB Connection Cable, AC Cable, DC Cable, Shoulder Strap, CD-ROMFeatures
Full-HD Movie Recording in AVCHD - With the GH1, shooting incredible photos is only part of the fun. You can also shoot beautiful, richly detailed movies in full-HD (high-definition) (1920 x 1080) at 24 frames per second, or smooth HD (1280 x 720) movies at 60 frames per second in AVCHD (MPEG-4/H.264) with a continuous auto focus function.
Enjoy the Freedom of Manual Settings in Creative Movie Mode - It lets you adjust the shutter speed and aperture any way you like when shooting movies.
An Audio Performance that Adds to Your HD Movies - Just set the GH1 to iA mode, aim and shoot. The iA does all the rest. It automatically determines the most suitable Scene mode and helps correct blurring, focus, and brightness problems for bright, sharply focused HD movies.
The Advanced iA Mode Uses Face Recognition to Remember Individual Faces
